memberdef.name: EXPECT_CONTROL_COMMAND_EQ
memberdef.initializer: EXPECT_DOUBLE_EQ(msg.velocity, proto.velocity()); \ EXPECT_DOUBLE_EQ(msg.steering_angle_velocity, proto.steering_angle_velocity()); \ EXPECT_DOUBLE_EQ(msg.steering_angle, proto.steering_angle()); \ EXPECT_DOUBLE_EQ(msg.acceleration, proto.acceleration());
